title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Oil Emergency Contingency and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Oil Emergency Contingency and 
Transfer of Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (Vesting Day) (Part 
3) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited oil emergency contingency transfer renewable transport fuel function act 2023 (vesting day) (part 3) order 2023

title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 2. The 28th day of February 2023 is appointed to be the vesting day for
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of February 2023 is appointed to be the vesting day for 
the purposes of Part 3 of the Oil Emergency Contingency and Transfer of 
Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 February, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [82] 3
text_norm: 2 28th day february 2023 appointed vesting day purpose part 3 oil emergency contingency transfer renewable transport fuel function act 2023 (no 2 2023) given official seal 28 february 2023 eamon ryan minister transport notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 3rd march 2023 82 3

title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 28 February 2023 as the vesting day, for the purposes of 
Part 3 of the Oil Emergency Contingency and Transfer of Renewable Transport 
Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023). 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [82]
